name: Box Armada
description:
A box-by-box physics-based ship simulator where you build and destroy. Assemble ships from a variety of available components and fight against fleets of AI or create a custom battle where you get to watch the outcome!

I'm releasing this alpha with a single test map and a few building options. Let me know what you think!

As for the future gameplay style, I have two proposed options.

1. Level-based "puzzle" style where you use the limited boxes provided to complete the objective

2. A survival based sandbox where you build your ship to defend an upgradable base. Possibly enemy AI bases that need to be destroyed to win, or simple wave based survival.

I'm happy to take suggestions as well!
